title: Vote for the launch of BEL Token in the Innovation Zone of ForTube BSC
body:
In order to introduce more high-quality assets to the ForTube ecosystem, and provide higher revenue and more flexible value capture opportunities, ForTube will cooperate with more excellent DeFi project and communities.

ForTube plans to launch BEL in the innovation zone of ForTube BSC. At present, ForTube and Bella Protocol have completed the preliminary communication for the launch details. The key parameters are as follows:

Token: BEL
Network: BSC
Zone: Innovation Zone
 LTV : 60%
Liquidation Threshold: 70%
Liquidation Reward: 12%
Deposit Limit: 6,000,000
Borrow Limit: No Limit

BEL BSC Contract:0x8443f091997f06a61670b735ed92734f5628692f

If the vote is approved, ForTube will carry out  mining activities, and the specific parameters are as follows:

Deposit BEL to Earn FOR
Mining Supply Amount:140,000 FOR
Mining Cycle: 14 days
Starting Time: Jun 9th, 2021   14:00

Deposit FOR to Earn  BEL
Mining Supply Amount: 27,778 BEL 
Mining Cycle: 30 days
Starting Time: Jun 9th,2021   14:00

Now, we will submit this proposal to the ForTube community, and users can vote through Snapshot.
Voting Time: Jun 8th, 2021 6PM -  Jun 9th, 2021 10AM
A. Agree to launch BEL in the ForTube BSC Innovation Zone
B. Disagree to launch BEL in the ForTube BSC  Innovation Zone

关于ForTube BSC版本创新区上线 BEL 代币的提案投票
	
作为面向未来的全新DeFi产品，ForTube推出了全面升级的ForTube V3版本。通过资产评级和资金分池，ForTube V3完成了创新区和稳健区资金池的风险隔离，最大程度的规避了金融传染的风险，缓解了质押资产系统失灵及市场波动的影响。
	
为了将更多优质资产引入ForTube生态，为ForTube用户提供更高收益，更加灵活的价值捕获机会，ForTube将与更多优秀的DeFi项目和社区进行合作。


ForTube建议 BEL 项目上线BSC版创新区。目前，双方已经完成了上线的审慎沟通，关键参数如下：

    币种： BEL
	网络：BSC
	分区：创新区
	质押率：60%
	清算线：70%
	清算奖励：12%
	存币上限：600万
	借币上限：不限

BEL BSC合约地址:0x8443f091997f06a61670b735ed92734f5628692f
如果投票通过，ForTube将开展联合挖矿活动，具体参数如下：

【存BEL挖FOR】
挖矿供应数量：14万FOR
挖矿周期:14天
开始时间:2021年6月9日 14:00
                                                 
【存FOR挖BEL】
挖矿供应数量: 27,778 BEL 
挖矿周期：30天
开始时间：2021年6月9日 14:00

现在将本提案提交ForTube社区，用户可通过Snapshot进行投票。
 投票时间：2021年6月8日18:00—6月9日10:00
A：同意BEL上架ForTube创新区
B：反对BEL上架ForTube创新区
author: 0x7ff8e1d2DDaAc39C18514ebB411F23d8A5174403
